ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃+* » -/
/-- Two uncountable algebraically closed fields of characteristic zero are isomorphic
if they have the same cardinality. -/
@[nolint def_lemma]
theorem ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_zero [CharZero K] [CharZero L] (hK : cardinal.aleph_0 < cardinal.mk K)
    (hKL : cardinal.mk K = cardinal.mk L) : «expr ≃+* » K L :=
  by
  apply Classical.choice
  cases' exists_is_transcendence_basis ℤ (show function.injective (algebraMap ℤ K) from Int.cast_injective) with s hs
  cases' exists_is_transcendence_basis ℤ (show function.injective (algebraMap ℤ L) from Int.cast_injective) with t ht
  have : cardinal.mk s = cardinal.mk t :=
    by
    rw [← cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt _ hs (le_of_eq mk_int) hK, ←
      cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt _ ht (le_of_eq mk_int), hKL]
    rwa [← hKL]
  cases' Cardinal.eq.1 this with e
  exact ⟨equiv_of_transcendence_basis _ _ e hs ht⟩
#align ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_zero ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_zero
ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_p:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃+* » -/
private theorem ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_p (p : ℕ) [Fact p.prime] [CharP K p] [CharP L p]
    (hK : cardinal.aleph_0 < cardinal.mk K) (hKL : cardinal.mk K = cardinal.mk L) : «expr ≃+* » K L :=
  by
  apply Classical.choice
  cases'
    exists_is_transcendence_basis (ZMod p)
      (show function.injective (algebraMap (ZMod p) K) from RingHom.injective _) with
    s hs
  cases'
    exists_is_transcendence_basis (ZMod p)
      (show function.injective (algebraMap (ZMod p) L) from RingHom.injective _) with
    t ht
  have : cardinal.mk s = cardinal.mk t :=
    by
    rw [← cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt _ hs (lt_aleph_0_of_finite (ZMod p)).le hK, ←
      cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt _ ht (lt_aleph_0_of_finite (ZMod p)).le, hKL]
    rwa [← hKL]
  cases' Cardinal.eq.1 this with e
  exact ⟨equiv_of_transcendence_basis _ _ e hs ht⟩
#align ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_p ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_p
ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃+* » -/
/-- Two uncountable algebraically closed fields are isomorphic
if they have the same cardinality and the same characteristic. -/
@[nolint def_lemma]
theorem ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_eq (p : ℕ) [CharP K p] [CharP L p] (hK : cardinal.aleph_0 < cardinal.mk K)
    (hKL : cardinal.mk K = cardinal.mk L) : «expr ≃+* » K L :=
  by
  apply Classical.choice
  rcases CharP.char_is_prime_or_zero K p with (hp | hp)
  · haveI : Fact p.prime := ⟨hp⟩
    exact ⟨ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_p p hK hKL⟩
  · rw [hp] at *
    skip
    letI : CharZero K := CharP.charP_to_charZero K
    letI : CharZero L := CharP.charP_to_charZero L
    exact ⟨ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_zero hK hKL⟩
#align ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_eq ring_equiv_of_cardinal_eq_of_char_eq
is_alg_closure_of_transcendence_basis:
theorem is_alg_closure_of_transcendence_basis [is_alg_closed K] (hv : is_transcendence_basis R v) :
    is_alg_closure (Algebra.adjoin R (Set.range v)) K :=
  letI := RingHom.domain_nontrivial (algebraMap R K)
  { alg_closed := by infer_instance
    algebraic := hv.is_algebraic }
#align is_alg_closure_of_transcendence_basis is_alg_closure_of_transcendence_basis
cardinal_mk_le_sigma_polynomial:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Chris Hughes. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Chris Hughes
-/
theorem cardinal_mk_le_sigma_polynomial :
    cardinal.mk L ≤ cardinal.mk (Σp : polynomial R, { x : L // x ∈ (p.map (algebraMap R L)).roots }) :=
  @mk_le_of_injective L (Σp : polynomial R, { x : L | x ∈ (p.map (algebraMap R L)).roots })
    (fun x : L =>
      let p := classical.indefinite_description _ (halg x)
      ⟨p.1, x, by
        dsimp
        have h : p.1.map (algebraMap R L) ≠ 0 :=
          by
          rw [ne.def, ← Polynomial.degree_eq_bot,
            Polynomial.degree_map_eq_of_injective (NoZeroSMulDivisors.algebraMap_injective R L),
            Polynomial.degree_eq_bot]
          exact p.2.1
        erw [Polynomial.mem_roots h, Polynomial.IsRoot, Polynomial.eval_map, ← Polynomial.aeval_def, p.2.2]⟩)
    fun x y => by
    intro h
    simp only at h
    refine' (Subtype.heq_iff_coe_eq _).1 h.2
    simp only [h.1, iff_self_iff, forall_true_iff]
#align cardinal_mk_le_sigma_polynomial cardinal_mk_le_sigma_polynomial
cardinal_mk_le_max:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `polynomial -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/-- The cardinality of an algebraic extension is at most the maximum of the cardinality
of the base ring or `ℵ₀` -/
theorem cardinal_mk_le_max : cardinal.mk L ≤ max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
  calc
    cardinal.mk L ≤ cardinal.mk (Σp : polynomial R, { x : L // x ∈ (p.map (algebraMap R L)).roots }) :=
      cardinal_mk_le_sigma_polynomial R L halg
    _ = Cardinal.sum fun p : polynomial R => cardinal.mk { x : L | x ∈ (p.map (algebraMap R L)).roots } := by
      rw [← mk_sigma] <;> rfl
    _ ≤ Cardinal.sum.{u, u} fun p : polynomial R => cardinal.aleph_0 :=
      (sum_le_sum _ _ fun p => (Multiset.finite_toSet _).lt_aleph_0.le)
    _ = cardinal.mk (polynomial R) * cardinal.aleph_0 := (sum_const' _ _)
    _ ≤ max (max (cardinal.mk (polynomial R)) (cardinal.aleph_0)) (cardinal.aleph_0) := (mul_le_max _ _)
    _ ≤ max (max (max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.aleph_0)) (cardinal.aleph_0)) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
      (max_le_max (max_le_max Polynomial.cardinal_mk_le_max le_rfl) le_rfl)
    _ = max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.aleph_0) := by
      simp only [max_assoc, max_comm (cardinal.aleph_0), max_left_comm (cardinal.aleph_0), max_self]
    
#align cardinal_mk_le_max cardinal_mk_le_max
cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
theorem cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis (hv : is_transcendence_basis R v) :
    cardinal.mk K ≤ max (max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.mk ι)) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
  calc
    cardinal.mk K ≤ max (cardinal.mk (Algebra.adjoin R (Set.range v))) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
      letI := is_alg_closure_of_transcendence_basis v hv
      algebra.is_algebraic.cardinal_mk_le_max _ _ is_alg_closure.algebraic
    _ = max (cardinal.mk (MvPolynomial ι R)) (cardinal.aleph_0) := by rw [Cardinal.eq.2 ⟨hv.1.aeval_equiv.to_equiv⟩]
    _ ≤ max (max (max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.mk ι)) (cardinal.aleph_0)) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
      (max_le_max MvPolynomial.cardinal_mk_le_max le_rfl)
    _ = _ := by simp [max_assoc]
    
#align cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis
cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.mk -/
/-- If `K` is an uncountable algebraically closed field, then its
cardinality is the same as that of a transcendence basis. -/
theorem cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt [Nontrivial R] (hv : is_transcendence_basis R v)
    (hR : cardinal.mk R ≤ cardinal.aleph_0) (hK : cardinal.aleph_0 < cardinal.mk K) : cardinal.mk K = cardinal.mk ι :=
  have : cardinal.aleph_0 ≤ cardinal.mk ι :=
    le_of_not_lt fun h =>
      not_le_of_gt hK <|
        calc
          cardinal.mk K ≤ max (max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.mk ι)) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
            cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis v hv
          _ ≤ _ := max_le (max_le hR (le_of_lt h)) le_rfl
          
  le_antisymm
    (calc
      cardinal.mk K ≤ max (max (cardinal.mk R) (cardinal.mk ι)) (cardinal.aleph_0) :=
        cardinal_le_max_transcendence_basis v hv
      _ = cardinal.mk ι := by
        rw [max_eq_left, max_eq_right]
        · exact le_trans hR this
        · exact le_max_of_le_right this
      )
    (mk_le_of_injective (show function.injective v from hv.1.injective))
#align cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt cardinal_eq_cardinal_transcendence_basis_of_aleph_0_lt
